subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tony Clark, a former All-Star first baseman, made the remarks in Lakeland, Fla., a day after the new commissioner, Rob Manfred, said he had received an application from Rose.
snippet: Tony Clark, a former All-Star first baseman, made the remarks in Lakeland, Fla., a day after the new commissioner, Rob Manfred, said he had received an application from Rose.
